issue.title: Build SplitSync - Clean Test
issue.body:
Build SplitSync expense sharing app.

Tech Stack:
- Next.js 16.1.4
- TypeScript 5.9.3
- Drizzle ORM with SQLite
- Socket.io for real-time
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui

Features:
1. User authentication
2. Group management
3. Expense tracking
4. Balance calculations
5. Settlement tracking
6. Real-time updates

ems.task: Set up project foundation - create .gitignore, package.json with all dependencies, tsconfig.json, next.config.js, tailwind.config.ts, postcss.config.js, .env.example, .github/workflows/ci.yml with lint/typecheck/test/build jobs, Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, and README.md with setup instructions

analysisSummary: Build SplitSync expense sharing application with user authentication, group management, expense tracking, balance calculations, settlement tracking, and real-time updates using Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, SQLite, Socket.io, and shadcn/ui

pendingEMs.task: Create shared types and utilities - define TypeScript interfaces for User, Group, Expense, Balance, Settlement; create validation schemas with zod; build utility functions for date formatting, currency handling, and calculations

Implement data layer - set up Drizzle ORM with SQLite, create database schema for users, groups, expenses, balances, settlements; create migration files; build repository pattern with CRUD operations for all entities

Implement authentication system - create auth API routes (register, login, logout, session), build auth middleware, implement JWT token handling, create session management, add protected route utilities
Create user and group management API - build REST API endpoints for user CRUD, group creation/joining/leaving, group member management, permissions handling, and group settings

Implement expense tracking API - create endpoints for adding/editing/deleting expenses, build expense splitting logic (equal, exact, percentage), implement category management, add receipt upload handling

Build balance and settlement system - create balance calculation engine, implement debt simplification algorithm, build settlement suggestion system, create payment tracking and settlement status APIs

Implement real-time updates - set up Socket.io server, create WebSocket event handlers for expenses, groups, and settlements, build presence system, implement notification system for expense additions and settlements

Create reusable UI components - build shadcn/ui components (Button, Input, Card, Dialog, Form, Table), create layout components (Header, Sidebar, MainLayout), build data display components (ExpenseList, BalanceCard, UserAvatar), create form components with validation
Build authentication and user pages - create login/signup pages with forms and validation, build user profile page, implement password reset flow, create onboarding flow for new users

Build group management pages - create group list/dashboard, build group detail view with members and expenses, implement create/edit group modals, add invite member functionality, create group settings page
